name: Seven Layer Bars (Vegan)
description: Ooey gooey vegan Seven Layer Bars are sprinkled with chocolate chips, marshmallows, nuts, and coconut before theyâ€™re finished with a drizzle of vegan sweetened condensed milk.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Spray a 9x13 inch baking pan with non-stick spray and line with parchment paper (trust me, things can get sticky and hard to clean).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Spray a 9x13 inch baking pan with non-stick spray and line with parchment paper (trust me, things can get sticky and hard to clean).

recipeInstructions.text: In a microwave safe bowl, melt the vegan butter. Once melted, stir in the graham cracker crumbs until combined. Press evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan.
recipeInstructions.name: In a microwave safe bowl, melt the vegan butter. Once melted, stir in the graham cracker crumbs until combined. Press evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the chocolate chips, marshmallows, pecans and shredded coconut evenly over the crust.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the chocolate chips, marshmallows, pecans and shredded coconut evenly over the crust.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sweetened condensed milk on top and use a spatula to make sure it's evenly distributed.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sweetened condensed milk on top and use a spatula to make sure it's evenly distributed.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the edges start to turn golden brown. Remove from the oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the edges start to turn golden brown. Remove from the oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely in the pan before lifting the bars out using the parchment paper. You can stick the pan in the refrigerator to speed the cooling process, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely in the pan before lifting the bars out using the parchment paper. You can stick the pan in the refrigerator to speed the cooling process, if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut in 24 small squares using a very sharp, large knife. The bars will still be very gooey and messy, so serve on a plate with a fork! Store leftover bars in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut in 24 small squares using a very sharp, large knife. The bars will still be very gooey and messy, so serve on a plate with a fork! Store leftover bars in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

keywords: vegan magic bars, vegan seven layer bars
